overview: Vera is looking for her sister, from whom there has been no news for several weeks. Vera and her husband Peter break down the door to her apartment to make sure that the girl has been missing there for a long time. A woman in despair turns to the police, where they understand that it is almost impossible to find her sister alive. Vera is not sure that she will be able to make an identification, then her husband, who has his own personal interests in this case, is called to do it…
title: Philemon and Baucis
